amendment.description: To add provisions regarding the promotion of United States values and the reduction of childhood exposure to extremist ideologies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 743 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 743 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 743 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 743 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Rubio.
